name: Inbetween a Land of Grass
description:
[ CONTROLS ]

Movement - ARROW KEYS

Reset - R

[ Inbetween a Land of Grass ]

A small earthquake has shaken up the area around VALLEY 8 & VALLEY 7! All of their boxes are mixed up. They could use some help! Also this one person broke a lot of glass somehow?

[ LD PAGE]

http://www.ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-30/?action=preview&uid=41662

[ NOTES ]

This is my Ludum Dare 30 submission to the compo, the theme was "Connected Worlds"! It was made in Unity Free without any assets or libraries from scratch in 48 hours. The source unity files are attached as required by the compo! Thanks for playing! This is my first Ludum Dare, It was a lot of fun! ' u '

- Taylor (@fromsmiling)
